response.headline: Sangenjaya district in Tokyo being compared to Brooklyn as one of the world's coolest streets
response.summary: Sangenjaya (三軒茶屋) in Tokyo is being highlighted as Tokyo's equivalent to Brooklyn, ranked as one of the coolest streets in the world. The area is recommended as a must-visit destination for Tokyo trips.
